Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Public Safety

Items.Title: Oversight - Enforcing Marijuana Laws
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on the enforcement of marijuana possession.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the PD to submit reports on the enforcement of marijuana possession.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the New York State Legislature to amend the Penal Law Section 130.05 to include individuals in police custody as being categorically incapable of consenting to sexual conduct with a police officer
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to amend the Penal Law Section 130.05 to include individuals in police custody as being categorically incapable of consenting to sexual conduct with a police officer.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Public Safety
Oversight - Enforcing Marijuana Laws
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports on the enforcement of marijuana possession.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the PD to submit reports on the enforcement of marijuana possession.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the New York State Legislature to amend the Penal Law Section 130.05 to include individuals in police custody as being categorically incapable of consenting to sexual conduct with a police officer
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to amend the Penal Law Section 130.05 to include individuals in police custody as being categorically incapable of consenting to sexual conduct with a police officer.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Treyger, Barron, Reynoso, Richards, Gibson, Cabrera, Deutsch, Miller, Rodriguez, Vallone, Williams, Brannan and Powers.
